body.name: Crossbody Sling Bag,Waterproof Sling Backpack for Men with USB Charging Port Lightweight Casual Daypack
features: 【Fashionable and Travel-Ready】Sling bag offers the perfect balance of compactness and functionality. Its external dimensions of 13.4" x 7.5" x 3.1" make it an ideal choice for those seeking a lightweight and streamlined solution to carry their essentials while on the go.And it also has a USB charging port design, which can effectively solve your outdoor charging anxiety.

【Organized and Efficient Storage】Featuring three compartments, our crossbody Bag provides ample storage for various items. The quick access front pocket is designed to hold AirPods Pro and credit cards, while the middle compartments are perfect for tech devices like Kindle, Nintendo Switch console, power bank, and cables. The hidden back pocket ensures the safety of your phone or passport.

【Comfortable and Ergonomic】Designed for optimal comfort, our sling bag features an ergonomic single-strap design that distributes the load evenly and reduces strain on your body. The adjustable strap ensures a customized fit, allowing you to wear it comfortably for extended periods.

【Durable and Water-Resistant】Constructed with Lightweight nylon material , the shoulder backpack is built to withstand the rigors of daily use. It is incredibly sturdy, lightweight, and water-resistant, ensuring your belongings stay protected even in unpredictable weather conditions.

【Adjustable Double Sided Straps】The lower part of the sling backpack is designed with 2 D-rings for easy wearing on the left or right shoulder. Adjustable shoulder straps ranging from 31-40 inches can be adjusted to a comfortable position according to your preference.Free your hands for shopping, walking, traveling, Disneyland, etc.
body.description: Aamytike Sling Bag for Men, Waterproof Mens Shoulder bags Crossbody Sling Backpack The Aamytike crossbody bag with USB charging made of high-quality waterproof durable material, large capacity, multiple compartments and comfortable shoulder strap. This shoulder bag for mens hiking backpack, business, outdoor and other occasions to meet the needs of daily travel. Material: Naturally water resistant polyester+PU Size:12.20" x 5.90" x 2.95“,and it also has a USB charging port design. Capacity: Meet your daily need, enough space to hold water bottle, colthes, ipad,notebook,umbrella etc. Gender: Unisex,fashion style, the best choice for your daily use. Adjustable Strap：You can adjusted the length according to your needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute little fashionable sling bag that is very reasonably priced!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I got this sling bag to carry loose things while hiking and I liked it overall. It looks fancy and small too with good quality interior lining and would last long. For the price, I recommend it.Our (My wife and I) 2 cents below:Pros:- Fancy sling bag & looks modern overall- Belt is long and easy to wear these- Build quality is good overall including the interior clothes- Has multiple pockets to organize things- USB charging port in these is a nice feature- These bags are water resistant- Very reasonably priced in this competitive marketCons:- None that my wife sees for now at this price point but I wish these were waterproof too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for my iPhone and iPads and stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars does the job
reviews.reviewText: won't win any style awards but does the job and looks sturdy enough

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it can carry more than I thought, and very comfortable as I move about my work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buen material comoda

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buen tamaño se ve bien

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Charger does not work
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a trip to Egypt. Charged and got on the plane. Get all the way there and the damn charger portion doesn’t work. Now I’m outside of the window to return it once I get back. Do not buy this if you’re looking for it to actually work!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Charging connection didn't work
reviews.reviewText: The bag itself is a good size and feels great. Unfortunately I bought it because it allowed charging through a port in the bag, and that port does not work on my bag. My devices registered a connection but did not charge even after swapping out various cables. Disappointing, but too close to our trip to exchange it at this point. Probably will not purchase this kind in the future.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena mochila para llevar al pecho o a la espalda
reviews.reviewText: Tiene una buena capacidad y llevo en ella muchas cosas sin quedar apretujadas: power bank de 25K, ipad de 10 pulgadas, ebook kindle y alguna cosa más de la forma más cómoda y en solo esta mochila
Das ist halt ein Rücksack mit Lade Funktion es hat eine Gute Qualität und der Komfort wird auch nicht beeinträchtigt durch die Lade Funktion also alles insgesamt Gut.
Sacoche bien grande et pratique. Elle est jolie.

Ho acquistato questo prodotto, per via delle dimensioni ridotte, e perchè permette di essere trasportato senza grandissime esigenze. Il prodotto ha soddisfatto in pieno le mie aspettative.- Il materiale è rivestito con ottimo materiale, da proprio la sensazione di robustezza, la tracolla non è scomoda, anzi fornisce un'ottima sensazione di stabilità alle spalle.- Dentro è ricoperta di tante tasche e taschini per qualsiasi tipo di necessità, cerniere resistenti e anche il colore non mi dispiace.- Provato con pioggia leggera, neanche una goccia è entrata dentro, prodotto abbastanza affidabileL'unica cosa è che bisogna regolare con attenzione la tracolla, all'inizio non si capisce bene come fare, ma dopo alcuni tentativi è abbastanza semplice.Per il resto la consiglio vivamente, se si vuol andare in giro senza che faccia troppa pressione alla spalla, ovviamente da non sovraccaricare di roba. Ho provato anche ad inserire una macchina fotografica mirrorless con obiettivo 16-80, è entrata senza problemi, e con un pò di spazio che avanzava.Più che soddisfatto, da utilizzare per qualsiasi evento, passeggiata, mare, gita.
Il regalo è stato molto apprezzato per la comodità e l'ottima qualità
